original_title: How to Buy Apartment in Serbia
overview: Story about young woman who wanted to buy apartment. She was saving money for 5 years, she had 4 jobs, worked 16 hours a day. One of her job was making and selling greeting cards for flower shops. It was very hard work. She was caring bags of greeting cards, going from one shop to the next, not going home until she sells everything. in all kind of weather conditions, rain, snow, summer hit. She also worked as a designer, and a design teacher and selling cosmetic products. She was very persistent and hardworking, not going on a vacation, not buying clothes or other things for 5 years.  It was a very hard journey but she made her dream come true.
title: How to Buy Apartment in Serbia
